title: Send My Love / Sit Still, Look Pretty
lyrics: This was all you, none of it me You put your hands all over my body and told me For the big one, for the big jump I'd be your last love everlasting you and me I'm giving you up I've forgiven it all Oh, I don't know what you've been told But this gal right here's gonna rule the world Yeah, that is where I'm gonna be because I wanna be Send my love to your new lover We've gotta let go of all of our ghosts Send my love to your new lover We've gotta let go of all of our ghosts Could dress up, to get love But guess what?, I'm never gonna be that girl Could wake up, And make up, And play dumb, pretending that I need a boy I know the other girlies wanna wear expensive things But I don't wanna be the puppet Send my love to your new lover that is where I'm gonna be because I wanna be Send my love to your new lover that is where I'm gonna be because I wanna be Your a pretty girl (If you're ready, ) I'm a pretty girl (If you're ready, ) Your a pretty girl (If you're ready, ) Your a pretty girl (If you're ready, ) Oh, I don't know what you've been told Yeah, that is where I'm gonna be because I wanna be Send my love to your new lover that is where I'm gonna be because I wanna be Send my love to your new lover that is where I'm gonna be because I wanna be No, I don't wanna sit still, look pretty
